about_the_game:
Sex & Coffee ☕️🤎 is an adult visual novel about romance, freshly brewed coffee, magic, and temptation in a modern fantasy world.

Welcome to a world where goblins are TikTok influencers, trolls sell ice cream, and fairies drive taxis. You’re Seth, the new barista at a cozy coffee shop that’s become the go-to spot for people seeking more than just the perfect cup of coffee — they come here for connection. But there’s a catch: the shop is on the brink of shutting down. It’s up to you to save it by mastering the art of coffee and winning over the hearts of the locals.

Get to know your enchanting customers — each with their own baggage and secrets. There’s Sonia, the cute bunny cop; Beata, the mysterious demoness writer; Shaya, a badass orc financial analyst; and Ila, a wild elf with an untamed spirit. Each of them is drawn to you, but it’s up to you to figure out how to win their hearts (and their coffee orders).

What’s brewing for you:


  • Coffee crafting like a pro: Unlock unique recipes using magical ingredients and create drinks that wow your customers.
  • Flirting and connections: Build relationships with the girls, deciding whether to go all-in on one or see where things lead with all of them.
  • Spicy side quests: Take on special "after-dark" missions to uncover deeper secrets about the world and its characters.
  • Explore the city: Meet quirky fantasy creatures, discover their stories, and spread the word about your coffee shop.
  • Exclusive content: Unlock steamy and intimate moments with the characters as your relationships evolve.

    Sex & Coffee ☕️🤎 isn’t just about brewing drinks — it’s about brewing love, magic, and temptation in every cup. Your choices will shape the future of the coffee shop and the fiery connections you build along the way. So, who’s ready for a refill?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. The game graphically depicts sex. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
